question: Which Indian has been elected to board of The Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York?
explanation: Reliance Chairperson, Mukesh Ambani’s wife Nita Ambani was recently elected to the Board of The Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York.She became the first Indian to be honoured with the role of the trustee in the Museum’s 150-year-history. Ambani\'s backing has had an enormous impact on the museum\'s ability to study and display art from every corner of the world.
